name: Nodachi VR
description:
You are the last human left to guard the holy cherry tree.
IT MUST NOT FALL.
Use your skills to fight off an invasion of the undead army.

Sword fighting VR game that gets faster as you play.
How many can you beat before giving up?

Hello guys,

I am Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
